TopicTitle: Part temperature gauges? I can't find them

Articles.Content:
Added Part temperature gauges/highlighting (toggle with F10)

The 1.0.1 notes mention temp gauges for parts. Pressing F10 shows notification text that the feature is Off/On, but no new display appears, and no new info is on the parts while in flight mode.

How do I use this feature?

P.S. F11 now give temperature overlay, I'm not referring to this feature.

Edited May 1, 2015 by Ridge363

Right click the part?

Yes, when I right click to get the context menu for a part. I don't see temperature data in the display.
Red5 just told me in the chat, that they will show once the temperature is nearing dangerous levels.
